txt.en: 'You were amazing! You deserve to know the dance of Men. You are a true grace among us. Thank you for joining us!'
Dances with Men

'The dance will begin soon! Make sure you have me targeted when I begin to call out the dance-moves.'

It is festival time! A time of dance and celebration. Come dance with the Men and learn their steps.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Follow the dance steps called out by the Dance Leader.
The Dance Leader is in the centre of the Bree Festival Grounds.\n\nHaving completed the dance-steps required, speak to the Dance Leader to learn the dance of Men.

'Welcome to the festival, friend. I see that you would like to participate in the dancing and rejoicing that happens when the festival comes to town. I too, would love to dance in joyous merriment. \n\n'Every twenty minutes, I will lead a dance in celebration of the festival. I would love for you to come join me when the time has come!'
